I had dinner here and it was very good but not as amazing as the other reviews.  I did not come for their take away foods so I cannot speak to that, but coming from NYC and given the other great restaurants in the area, I don't know if I would necessarily come back.  I had the octopus and burrata.  Neither was anything special, but still had a nice dinner.  I had the lemon meringue pie for dessert which was ok, but I have had much better before.  Dry martini was the best part of this meal.  Was made perfectly!
